cards.name: Nyasha Ndhlovu
cards.title: Product Designer/Developer
cards.about: I still believe Pluto is a planet—because sometimes, redefining the rules leads to better discoveries. As a product developer and designer, I challenge conventions to create solutions that are not only functional but also spark curiosity and connection. I design for the outliers, the dreamers, and the ones who see possibilities where others see limits.

cards.name: Diatile Ndhlovu
cards.title: Co-founder & Product Manager
cards.about: I conjure digital symphonies! I'm a tech alchemist, turning raw ideas into dazzling, game-changing solutions. My mission? To not just keep up with the tech revolution, but to throw a wild after-party!

cards.name: Menelisi Mvinjelwa
cards.title: Design & Marketing Specialist
cards.about: I create. I adapt. I conquer. Every design strategy, every project is a battle against limits. To defy expectations. To create something that lasts. Because in this world, there is no final form—only the next level.

cards.name: Octavia
cards.title: Campaign Manager
cards.about: As a Campaign Manager, I specialize in creating and executing marketing campaigns that drive engagement and growth. My goal is to deliver impactful and measurable results for our clients.
